data.name: F*ck This Game
data.detailed_description:
If you're looking for a simple game with easy gameplay, and a forgiving atmosphere, LEAVE THIS GAME PAGE. This isn't that kind of game.

No, you see, F*ck This Game is a game that is extremely difficult. The premise may sound simple: use the keys on your keyboard to control small minigames, including a side-scrolling platformer and a shoot-em-up game. But here's the catch: you'll have to control up to 8 of these games at the same time.

You'll earn points for doing certain things, whether it's jumping over an obstacle or catching fruit in a basket. Some of the minigames feature 2x multipliers, giving you a chance to get an even higher score! But don't hit any obstacles... when you drop to 0 points, you lose!

And let's not forget all the wonderous ways the game will attempt to forcefully deplete your score. Whether it's covering up the minigames, big bugs blocking your view, or even playing random sounds, you'll be constantly barraged with distraction after distraction! Unfair as it may be, do you think you're up to the challenge?

FEATURES

  • Arcade-style gameplay
  • 9 minigames to play
  • Original soundtrack composed entirely by helloitscrash
  • Fun instructional art
  • a̷͉̼͔̾́̀͋͘͜n̴̩͋t̸̟̬̺͓̅̆̈́̐̈́ï̸̘̭͕̀͜c̵̳͙̉͠i̴̧͙̩͓̘̽̔͒́̚p̴͍͈̲͗̿͝a̸̳͓͚̥̪͖̱̺̐͂̂͆͝t̶̫̜̯̼͇̮͐̕i̵͇̖̫̥̬̤͚͎̓̆̑͌̔̋ö̷͖̔̽n̷͇͎͎̼̜̳̜̦͛̽̌̐͐̾͂͘ͅ
  • Retro graphics and sound effects
  • Customizable options, including multiple backgrounds

FREQUENTLY ANSWERED QUESTIONS

  • Isn't that supposed to be "asked?" Not "answered?"
    Yeah. I don't care
  • Is there anything you're hiding from us?
    Yesn't
  • Why is the game labeled as horror in the tags?

  • Is this game really that hard?
    Play it for yourself. :)

data.short_description: A difficult arcade game; multitask by controlling 8 minigames at once to reach the highest score you can!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 200 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: In order for you to fully enjoy the experience, fullscreen has been disabled in the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 500 MB
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 200 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: In order for you to fully enjoy the experience, fullscreen has been disabled in the game
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Monterey
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 500 MB
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
